title: I'm on to you Macromite!
body:
Using the meme war as cover to hide your evil plans of taking over the boards with your crab army!
https://media.giphy.com/media/3o6Ztmf8HmswTStiBG/giphy.gif

Well ill have you know that I have plans to stop your evil plan in place!

Behold your true weakness!

http://www.sweethopecookies.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/IMG_3592.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/tmJGXAR.gif?noredirect

replies.body:
You only have half of the tools needed to defeat me.

You will never stop my crabs with just butter.

Oh but that's were your wrong. I have Brand for the cooking part!

http://i.imgur.com/y0EGM9k.jpg?noredirect

https://66.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m8ghad1qJe1qkvue8o1_500.gif

W- Well atleast you are still missing an important part.
Pfft, you think he's missing salt... This is a league player we are speaking of for goodness sake
I figured he had salt, he is from NA after all.

https://embed.gyazo.com/89ea74ec3d583ba9395c69668ea6c557.gif

I- I mean, T- That wouldn't be good for me, b- but no. That's not the part I'm talking about.

He's talking about a pot.
But he forgets im the master of  metal.

http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m5qfji6hHU1r3ykgdo1_500.gif
You have Pot, damn, talk bout 420 Blaze it

Well, I mean, if he becomes a squadron leader in my army then he will technically have 1/3 of an army.

http://ci.memecdn.com/437/6097437.jpg

Gasp! Is Macromite in league with Lol Ergo Urgot?  I mean Urgot, crabs... GIANT ENEMY CRABGOT!  The truth was staring us in the face all along.  He even tried to trick me...

> [{quoted}](name=macromite,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=XPGtuj7E,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-12T23:21:33.704+0000)
>
> That urgot should beware, This crab will never fail the M&G Boards

I see your game now krabby.

No... He's clean I vouch for him
*the only truth*
